comments: MOB and LLS show Fournier (ORL) cleanly dislodges the ball from Green (TOR), any additional contact to the arm is deemed incidental.
Green (TOR) makes incidental contact to Fournier (ORL) body during his follow through.
Vucevic (ORL) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Green (TOR) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Leonard (TOR) maintains a legal guarding position on Gordon (ORL) at the start of the drive when Gordon slips but is able to regain his balance.
Siakam (TOR) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Vucevic (ORL) could be deemed to be in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Gasol (TOR) and Fournier (ORL) engage and separate during the rebound.
Gordon (ORL) maintains a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact from Leonard (TOR) during the drive.
Fournier (ORL) briefly grasps Siakam's (TOR) jersey as they engage on the screen.
Vucevic (ORL) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Siakam (TOR) and firms up to absorb the contact.
LAR and MOB show Green (TOR) makes contact to Gordon's (ORL) arm during the rebound.
Vucevic (ORL) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Green (TOR) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Green (TOR) briefly places a hand/arm to the front of Augustin (ORL) at the start of the drive.
Lowry (TOR) makes marginal contact to the body of Augustin (ORL) during his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Lowry (TOR) is firming up and makes marginal contact with Gordon (ORL) on the pick.
RLS and RLB show Fournier (ORL) clamps Siakam's (TOR) arm during the rebound.
Vucevic (ORL) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Leonard (TOR) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Fournier (ORL) and Green (TOR) engage and separate before using the screen from Gasol (TOR).
Gasol (TOR) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Gordon (ORL) and firms up to absorb the contact.
Gasol (TOR) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Fournier (ORL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Green (TOR) and Augustin (ORL) engage and separate during the inbound.
